tags.name: masonry-layout
tags.description:
Masonry layout web component. It places the slotted elements in the optimal position based
on the available vertical space, just like mason fitting stones in a wall.

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: The ms of debounce when the element resizes.

attributes.name: maxcolwidth
attributes.description: The maximum width of each column if cols are set to auto.

attributes.name: gap
attributes.description: The gap in pixels between the columns.

properties.name: debounce
properties.description: The ms of debounce when the element resizes.

properties.name: maxColWidth
properties.description: The maximum width of each column if cols are set to auto.

properties.name: gap
properties.description: The gap in pixels between the columns.

slots.description: Items that should be distributed in the layout.

cssParts.name: column
cssParts.description: Each column of the masonry layout.

cssParts.name: column-index
cssParts.description: The specific column at the given index (eg. column-0 would target the first column and so on)
